page.title: 04Housing in Totteridge Bucks.
page.content: {Totteridge}is on the outskirts of{High {Wycombe}in the{Chiltern Hills}and lots of houses are built on slopes. We did a housing survey at{King's Wood Middle {School}and out of 208 famlies 129 have bought their own homes and 79 rented them. There are 379 more people than bedrooms so lots of people share a room. The most common house is a semi-detatched and most houses have 3 bedrooms.There is a wood called {King's Wood}and it makes{Totteridge more attractive. There are lots of private houses and small estates of expensive detached houses.{King's Wood {Middle School}is opposite some bungalows for old people. They have a warden to look after them and a common room. A typical 3 bedroomed semi-detached house costs around Â£45,000 in our area.
